metadata.title: CVE-2021-47141 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gve: Add NULL pointer checks when freeing irqs.When freeing notification blocks, we index priv->msix_vectors.If we failed to allocate priv->msix_vectors (see abort_with_msix_vectors)this could lead to a NULL pointer dereference if the driver is unloaded.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
